ingredients.item: 400g pack essential Waitrose British Turkey Breast & Thigh Mince
2 tbsp Waitrose Tomato & Piri Piri Chutney

instructions.step: Mix the turkey mince and the chutney together with your hands. Season and mould into 4 flat burgers, then chill for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the burgers for 3-4 minutes each side until golden and cooked throughout.
Meanwhile, mash the avocado flesh with the mayonnaise and season. Place a burger in each toasted muffin and top with the avocado. Serve with salad.
